column4: Can someone tell me how to get my latest nvidia drivers, for an nvidia geforce 6800 ? i used sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg is that all i need to do?
Can someone tell me how to get my latest nvidia drivers, for an nvidia geforce 6800 ? i used sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg is that all i need to do?
Can someone tell me how to get my latest nvidia drivers, for an nvidia geforce 6800 ? i used sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg is that all i need to do?
do you want the propietary drivers?
open source drivers supports only 2d acc, propietary ones support 2d and 3d
You know hot to recover if that dont work?
I've looked everywhere man. - installed a bunch of programs, configured them,, still no luck - as far as i could get was getting steam to try and update
an error with the program i was using, which was "Crossover"
do you mean get it from synaptic?
like it says on the winehq site

What does this mean: Now run wine without any parameters. When wine is run for the first time, it creates all necessary directories, including your fake C: drive, which is per default located in ~/.wine/drive_c.
Yes.. but what would it be if i want to just tamper with wine?
